column1: It is possible that this word shows influence from ''[[lala]]-'' in [[Quenya]], such as, in the name ''Lalwendë'' or, more commonly, ''Lalwen'' (laughing maiden).<ref name=Finwe>{{PM
In Common Eldarin the stem for 'laugh' is ''g''-''lada''-, in Quenya ''lala''-, in Telerin ''glada'', and in Sindarin ''glað''.<ref name=Finwe/>{{rp
